Name: RoboArena
About the game: Take part in the most popular Interplanetary TV show, where it all depends on your skills. Collect your robots from the available modules and join the battle! Earn modules and increase their level. Work with teammates to achieve the goal. Or try to become the best in FFA mode, fight to the last. Build your pedestal from the wreckage of your opponents.
Meta Title: RoboArena: Jun 11, 2020, Novalink and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on RoboArena? Check out the release date (Jun 11, 2020), developer insights from Novalink, and a complete game summary.
